title: Persona Prompt Front Matter
description: Metadata overrides embedded at the top of persona prompt markdown files.

model.description: OpenAI model identifier that overrides the persona's default (e.g., gpt-4o).

temperature.description: Controls response randomness; higher values produce more varied output.

top_p.description: Nucleus sampling parameter; consider adjusting only when temperature < 1.0.

max_output_tokens.description: Hard limit on response token count for this persona prompt.
